select db_bs.user.id, db_bs.user.name, CASE WHEN db_bs.user.identity = '1' THEN '项目经理' WHEN db_bs.user.identity = '2' THEN '需求' WHEN db_bs.user.identity = '3' THEN '开发' WHEN db_bs.user.identity = '4' THEN '测试' ELSE 'GGG' END identity from db_bs.user where db_bs.user.id in (select team.user_id from team where team.version_id=#{versionId} and team.sfyx=1)
